parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.98

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns trigger condition check frequency in seconds. <br><br> 

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> The trigger could be [[local]] or remote but the result returned by this command will be for the trigger interval set up locally on the client that executed the command. See [[createTrigger]] for more info.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[triggerInterval]] trigger

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] - Trigger object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - Trigger interval in seconds

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_interval = [[triggerInterval]] someTrigger;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setTriggerInterval]], [[createTrigger]], [[enableSimulation]], [[simulationEnabled]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
